project.title: 2019 Â· A video call feature for Minddistrict.com
project.intro: I created and supported implementation of a responsive design for a new video call feature during my internship at Minddistrict; a leading European e-mental health provider (website and app) that provides cognitive behavioural therapy modules and diaries that can be tailored into personalised routes to recovery. People can go through modules individually, or guided by their healthcare professional(s) who can help tailor modules, track progress and provide feedback within the Minddistrict environment through chat or a (group)video call.

project.team: Agile scrum team with 1 UX/UI designer (me), 2 developers, 1 QA and a product owner.
project.role: Conducting secondary research, exploring ideas through sketching, creating multiple interactive prototypes and iterative testing.
